entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8.
